item.title: Pizzini paper
item.description: Alex Pizzini got a paper with us published. It is a continuation of his thesis. Nice that there is still so much interest on cooperation. On my end the statistics was rather simple. Not much to do on the mathematical side. Analysis of volatile organic compounds in the breath of patients with stable or acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Details PDF
